dmca.title: [EV1-C1611800J] EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notic
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] Posted At: Thursday, November 02, 2006 4:23 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1611800J] EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notice! Subject: [EV1-C1611800J] EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notice! ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notice! Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 31 2006 02:09 pm X-MailFrom: aedryan@methyus.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [172.16.220.212] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Oct 31 14:08:49 2006 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by MAILCORE.THEPLANET.COM with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 31 Oct 2006 14:08:34 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 31 Oct 2006 14:08:32 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1162325307-19613-746-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from smtpout04-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net (smtpout04-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net [64.202.165.199]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with SMTP id 6AFA66092 for ; Tue, 31 Oct 2006 14:08:32 -0600 (CST) Received: (qmail 9457 invoked from network); 31 Oct 2006 20:08:16 -0000 Received: from unknown (24.52.126.93) by smtpout04-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net (64.202.165.199) with ESMTP; 31 Oct 2006 20:08:16 -0000 Message-ID: <002101c6fd28$531a75c0$020fa8c0@Methyus> From: "Aedryan Methyus" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notice! Subject: EV1Servers.net Hosted Website Doing Illegal Activities - Second Notice! Date: Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:08:05 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_001E_01C6FCFE.5DC01540" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: aedryan@methyus.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 31 Oct 2006 20:08:32.0685 (UTC) FILETIME=[570125D0:01C6FD28] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It May Concern, I recently discovered a website named www.123-paintballs.com, which is hosted by you folks. This scrupuless webmaster is sending spambots out to mine other website's copyright protected content and source codes and placing it on his website. He is doing this for the sole purpose of stealing our traffic and search engine rankings. Some of my website's content, including my name (and many others) can be found on the following page: http://www.123-paintballs.com/corporate-events/magician-corporate-event. html. I am in no way affiliated with this website, nor has permission been ever been granted to them to use my name or my website content on their website. I have emailed the webmaster repeatedly, requesting that my name and content be removed immediately and he blatantly refuses to do so. Additionally, he has threatened to create additional pages just to dephile my name and character now (I would be happy to send you that email at your request)! I have contacted some of the other websites that he is stealing content from and they are not happy. One of them (AllTimeFavorites.com) notified me that they discovered the webmaster isn't even using his real name, address or state with his registrar (BLACK ICE DOMAINS, INC). This horribly poor quality website is full of nothing but irrelevant, misleading, stolen content, typos, mis-spellings, improper grammer and jibberish. There are literally hundreds of pages of stolen content! As i'm sure you know, these sorts of practices could possi! bly result in other website's (including your own) eventually being banned and/or penalized by the search engines. If you folks could please see that my name and content are removed from this website immediately, it would be very much appreciated. Thank you for your time and please have a great day! Sincerely, Aedryan Methyus www.methyus.com MIME element (text/html)
To Whom It May Concern,
I recently discovered a website named www.123-paintballs.com, which is hosted by you folks. This scrupuless webmaster is sending spambots out to mine other website's copyright protected content and source codes and placing it on his website. He is doing this for the sole purpose of stealing our traffic and search engine rankings. Some of my website's content, including my name (and many others) can be found on the following page:
 
http://www.123-paintballs.com/corporate-events/magician-corporat e-event.html.
 
I am in no way affiliated with this website, nor has permission been ever been granted to them to use my name or my website content on their website. I have emailed the webmaster repeatedly, requesting that my name and content be removed immediately and he blatantly refuses to do so. Additionally, he has threatened to create additional pages just to dephile my name and character now (I would be happy to send you that email at your request)! I have contacted some of the other websites that he is stealing content from and they are not happy. One of them (AllTimeFavorites.com) notified me that they discovered the webmaster isn't even using his real name, address or state with his registrar (BLACK ICE DOMAINS, INC). This horribly poor quality website is full of nothing but irrelevant, misleading, stolen content, typos, mis-spellings, improper grammer and jibberish. There are literally hundreds of pages of stolen content! As i'm sure you know, these sorts of practices could possibly result in other website's (including your own) eventually being banned and/or penalized by the search engines.
 
If you folks could please see that my name and content are removed from this website immediately, it would be very much appreciated. Thank you for your time and please have a great day!
 
Sincerely,
Aedryan Methyus
www.methyus.com
MIME element (text/plain)
